name: Life is in your hand
description:
You control a hand that can push or pull a bird (toggle between the two). Use W, Up arrow or left mouse button to push the bird and S, Down arrow or right mouse button to pull the bird. Try to fly as far as possible (my own highscore is 22).

Made in Godot, graphics in Inkscape and music in BeepBox in ~2,5 hours for the TriJam, theme was push and pull.
